ygData.subject: RE: Paw of Opalla
ygData.msgSnippet: I have actually seen him. He was in Befallen, on the first level.  Just as you enter Befallen. I saw him inthe open area just before the stairs going down to
ygData.messageBody:
I have actually seen him.

He was in Befallen, on the first level. Just as you enter Befallen. I saw
him inthe open area just before the stairs going down to the 4 doors. I
don't think he was trained up too far, as I can't imagine anyone being able
to run fromthe third level, thru two locked doors, with him on your tail. So
I would imagine that he spawned relatively close to the point where I saw
him. BUt that is just conjecture, and you wanted facts. So the fact is, I
saw him on the first level, at the top of the very first set of stairs.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jerry Hawkins [mailto:jhawkins@...]
Sent: 1999/10/08 4:45 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Paw of Opalla


Hey Everyone,

I really would like to complete my Paw of Opalla, i TOTALLY lucked in to the
first 3 rings, i camped Mitty for about an hour and she droped the gold and
copper. Picked the silver up in Blackburrow, and now all i need is the
Platinum. Therein lies the problem.

I have heard many differing accounts of where to find Gynok Molter. So, if
you have SEEN him, not heard about him being somewhere, but ACTUALLY SEEN
HIM with YOUR character, please let me know where. Yes, i know Befallen,
but where? First floor in entrance area? Third floor near Elf Skeletons??
Please let me know any visual sightings.

Thanks,

Smeal Stonehammer
22nd Sphere of Life,
Deciple of Rodcet Nife,
Veeshan Existance

played by

Jerry Hawkins
Jhawkins@... <mailto:Jhawkins@...>
